description: A mysterious archer from the deserts of Sumeru, Sethos is an Electro bow user who excels at quick Electro application and charged attacks.
info: Sethos is a 4★ Electro bow DPS/sub-DPS who excels at quick Electro application and charged attacks. Build him for CRIT, ATK%, and Elemental Mastery.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Desert Bow
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Electro DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Secret Rite: Twilight Arrow
skills.desc: Sethos fires a Twilight Arrow that deals AoE Electro DMG and marks enemies. Marked enemies take increased damage from Electro attacks.
skills.details_html:
Secret Rite: Twilight Arrow
Fires a Twilight Arrow that deals AoE Electro DMG and marks enemies. Marked enemies take increased damage from Electro attacks for a short duration.

skills.name: Sacred Rite: Storm's Judgment
skills.desc: Sethos unleashes a storm of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Electro DMG and increasing his CRIT Rate for a short time.
skills.details_html:
Sacred Rite: Storm's Judgment
Unleashes a storm of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Electro DMG and increasing CRIT Rate for a short time.

passive_talents.name: Desert's Precision
passive_talents.desc: After using Secret Rite: Twilight Arrow, Sethos's ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Electro Mastery
passive_talents.desc: Sacred Rite: Storm's Judgment increases all party members' Electro DMG Bonus by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Desert Walker
passive_talents.desc: When Sethos is in the party, sprinting stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: First Arrow
constellations.desc: Secret Rite: Twilight Arrow gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Desert's Agility
constellations.desc: After using Sacred Rite: Storm's Judgment, Sethos's Movement SPD is increased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Storm's Verdict
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sacred Rite: Storm's Judgment by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Electro Supremacy
constellations.desc: Electro reactions triggered by Sethos restore 3 Energy to him. Can occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: Twilight Master
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Secret Rite: Twilight Arrow by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Desert's Triumph
constellations.desc: Allies within Sacred Rite: Storm's Judgment's area gain 20% increased CRIT Rate.
